context.p: Symptom: Clicking the Transcribe button results in empty text or an error.

step.cmd: Check that the Whisper service is running.
step.info: Ensure the Whisper API container is started.

step.cmd: Verify the audio region is not empty.
step.info: The selected region must contain audible speech.
Network or API errors will appear in the console.

step.cmd: Ensure the audio format is supported (MP3, WAV).
